name: 没有审查机构的审查
summary: 纪录片关于几十年前的那个黑暗的社会体制下，一群人是如何用电影去反抗政府的暴力和压制，他们即被后来者称为南斯拉夫”黑浪潮“一代。 A profound insight into history of Yugoslav cinema through censorship perspective. How did famous anti-communist movies from Yugoslav time succeeded in being made and what consequences did they had to bear? Film contains original interviews with most important dissident filmmakers from communist time, including Dus...
